trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger stands over Runar, ready to begin his ministrations.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Emet-Selch.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_TODO_01<tab>Use the aetherial lamp to find a location that resonates with the Lifestream.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_TODO_02<tab>Call for Emet-Selch.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Emet-Selch.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_RUNAR_000_000<tab>Master...Matoya...
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_URIANGER_000_010<tab>Rest, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I prithee. I shall attend to Runar's ministrations.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_THANCRED_000_020<tab>Though I am loath to trust him, I suppose we have no choice. For now, at least.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_RYNE_000_025<tab>Do you really think he can bring her back?

TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_URIANGER_000_030<tab>Could it truly be within his power to pluck Y'shtola from the Lifestream as he claimeth? 'Tis a feat beyond even the greatest practitioners of the arcane. Yet if he would attempt it, we cannot well stand in his way.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_RUNAR_000_035<tab>By the blessed Dark, there is yet hope!
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_ALMET_000_040<tab>I confess, I do not fully understand what is happening here─but I gather we were right to bring this man to you.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_UIMET_000_045<tab>We found him asleep in the shade of a tree near the ruins. A fine way to behave when one's companions are in dire straits.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_CYMET_000_050<tab>I am relieved to know he is an acquaintance of yours. Though I see you are not close. If he should displease you, we would be happy to deal with him...
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_060<tab>Now then, if I'm to fetch her for you, I will require a suitable place to work. We must find somewhere that resonates strongly with the Lifestream.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_061<tab>And by we, I mean you. To that end, I give you this─an aetherial lamp of my own design.

TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_062<tab>Keep it close as you venture out into the woods. The brighter the glow, the stronger the location's resonance with the Lifestream. Once you've found a likely spot, all you need do is whistle.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_063<tab>You do know how to whistle, don't you, hero? Just put your lips together and blow.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>To find a location that resonates with the Lifestream, you will need to search the area marked on your map.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>Use your aetherial lamp to pinpoint an ideal location then call for Emet-Selch.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_070<tab>Well, what are you standing around here for? Get searching! You <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> want to save her, don't you?
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>The lamplight is near blinding. Perhaps now would be a good time to call for Emet-Selch.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>The lamp glows brightly.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>The lamp glows warmly.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>The lamp glows faintly.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>The lamp is dim, as if it might go out at any moment.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_YSHTOLA_000_090<tab>Did Emet-Selch not return with you?
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_THANCRED_000_095<tab>Though I struggle to form the words...I am glad that Emet-Selch was here.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_THANCRED_000_096<tab>We can but pray Y'shtola never does anything so reckless again.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_RYNE_000_100<tab>Urianger once told me that being immersed in the Lifestream can cause irreparable harm to the body. Do you suppose Y'shtola is all right?
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_URIANGER_000_105<tab>In all of history, there are but few who have returned from a misadventure in the aetherial sea possessed of mind and body both.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_URIANGER_000_106<tab>To have done so <var 1A 02 /var>twice<var 1A 01 /var> beggareth belief. 'Tis plain Y'shtola wanteth not for favor among the Twelve.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_RUNAR_000_110<tab>By all that is dark, Master Matoya is returned! She stands here before me yet still I cannot believe it.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_ALMET_000_115<tab>We are both gladdened and relieved to see your companion returned hale and whole.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_UIMET_000_120<tab>With your friend returned, you will resume your exploration of the ruins, yes? But say the word and we shall assist you.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_CYMET_000_125<tab>It was fate who brought you to us, and fate who returned your companion to you. She yet smiles on Ronka, I am sure of it.

TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_130<tab>What a touching reunion that was. It fair brought a tear to the eye. But as we both know, such tender moments are nothing if not <var 1A 02 /var>momentary<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_131<tab>Before long, they will remember their many differences, and return to squabbling.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_A1_000_001<tab>You're wrong. They're better than that.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_A1_000_002<tab>Says the arch Bringer of Chaos.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_132<tab>Oh, if I had a gil for every time one of you <var 1A 02 /var>heroes<var 1A 01 /var> made that claim...
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_133<tab>Ah hah hah! Flattery will get you nowhere, <var 08 E905 ((my dear)) ((dear boy)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_134<tab>But seriously, we Ascians do what we do for the greater good. For the Rejoining.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_135<tab>Though we may sow the seeds of chaos, it is man who tends them, he who reaps their bountiful harvest.

TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_136<tab>But I grow tired of these arguments. If you would kindly refrain from retorting and return to your customary brooding silence, I will take it as thanks for rescuing your companion and leave it at that.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_137<tab>Now, we mustn't keep your friends waiting.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_EMETSELCH_000_140<tab>I told you, I tire of these inane arguments. Shouldn't you be getting ready to slay the next Lightwarden or something?

TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_YSHTOLA_000_150<tab>My apologies for having put you all through such an ordeal. I could see no other way to save the Night's Blessed. Happily, both they and I yet live─thanks to you.
TEXT_LUCKMC118_03339_YSHTOLA_000_151<tab>But our work here is not yet done. We must make ready to enter the Qitana Ravel, and put the Lightwarden to the sword.
